component.text:
Primary root bridge for VLAN 20
Secondary root bridge for VLAN 10

Primary root bridge for VLAN 10
Secondary root bridge for VLAN 20
This command forces S3 to be the primary root for VLAN 20.
This command forces S3 to be the secondary root for VLAN 10.
This command forces S1 to be the primary root for VLAN 10.
This command forces S1 to be the secondary root for VLAN 20.
This command sets the priority for S3 to be the lowest possible, making it most likely that S3 will be the primary root for VLAN 20.
This command sets the priority for S1 to be the lowest possible, making it most likely that S1 will be the primary root for VLAN 10.

component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command. Commands that include a name or password are case-sensitive.***
component.existingcommands:
Configure the following on S3
  • VLAN 20 as primary root
  • VLAN 10 as secondary root

command.instruction:
Configure the following on S1
  • VLAN 10 as primary root
  • VLAN 20 as secondary root
  • Set VLAN 1 to priority 0
  • Return to privileged EXEC mode
<font size = '10' face="Arial" class="font10px"><b>Display the spanning-tree status for VLAN 1.</font>

command.deviceresponse:
VLAN0001
Spanning tree enabled protocol ieee
Root ID Priority 1
Address 0019.aa9e.b000
This bridge is the root
Hello Time 2 sec Max Age 20 sec Forward Delay 15 sec

Bridge ID Priority 1 (priority 0 sys-id-ext 1)
Address 0019.aa9e.b000
Hello Time 2 sec Max Age 20 sec Forward Delay 15 sec
Aging Time 300 sec

Interface Role Sts Cost Prio.Nbr Type
------------------- ---- --- --------- -------- ---------------------------
Fa0/2 Desg FWD 19 128.2 P2p
Fa0/4 Desg FWD 19 128.4 P2p
command.instruction: <font size = '10' face="Arial" class="font10px"><b>Display the current configuration filtering the output to begin at spanning-tree.</font>

command.deviceresponse:
spanning-tree mode pvst
spanning-tree extend system-id
spanning-tree vlan 1 priority 0
spanning-tree vlan 10 priority 24576
spanning-tree vlan 20 priority 28672
<output omitted>
command.instruction: <font size = '10' face="Arial" class="font10px"><b>You successfully configured PVST+.</font>
